page.title: 08My Saturday in Chilton.
page.content: On a Saturday morning my brother and I get up at 8 o'clock, get washed, dressed and have our breakfasts (Weetabix and a hot cup of tea). We then go down to the newsagent's to get our Dad a paper.When we get back we go into the living room to watch the television. After this we will go and call for our friends to play football on the school field. At 12 o'clock we go home to get our dinners, which may be fish and chips. After dinner we go to Bishop Auckland to have a look around the shops. I sometimes buy a computer game with my pocket money. When we get back home at about 3 o'clock all the football teams will be kicking off. We watch the television and when the scores are read out we make a note of them all.
